input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product specifications and product name information.

Product name:
Master Grooming Tools 6-Inch Rubber Pet Oval Grooming Brush with Handstrap, Purple

Product specifications:
Oval brush are recommended for short coats
They promote a healthier coat for dogs, cats and small animals
Made of rubber
Available in purple color 
Measures 6-inch length
Can be used dry to remove dead hair or wet to massage skin and improve shampoo performance
Available in blue color
Rectangular brush ideal for medium or double-coated breeds
Easy-to-grasp handstraps for extra control




Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Master Grooming Tools 6-Inch Rubber Pet Oval Grooming Brush with Handstrap is a versatile and stylish grooming tool that will help you take care of your pet's coat. Made of rubber, this brush is designed to be durable and effective. The oval shape of the brush is perfect for short coats and is recommended for dogs, cats, and small animals. The brush is available in a beautiful purple color and measures 6-inches in length. It can be used dry to remove dead hair, or wet to massage the skin and improve shampoo performance. The easy-to-grasp handstraps provide extra control and make grooming your pet a breeze. This brush is available in blue color and rectangular in shape, which is ideal for medium or double-coated breeds.
input_text.Response B: These high-quality rubber brush can be used dry to remove dead hair or wet to massage skin and improve shampoo performance. They promote a healthier coat for dogs, cats and small animals. Oval brush are recommended for short coats, rectangular brush are ideal for medium or double-coated breeds. Easy-to-grasp handstraps provide extra control. Made of rubber. Available in blue and purple color. Measures 5-1/4-inch length.
